name: World Political Boundaries
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Top-down tactical map: World Political Boundaries, no tactical grid; labeled overlays, standard encounter size 15x15 squares (or 10x10); complex up to 30x30 squares, base relief with bathymetry/sky currents, overlay symbology + legend, multiple paths and choke points, elevation changes with contour lines/steps, bold lines for walls/obstacles; fine lines for textures; high-contrast grid, icons only; no text labels; VTT-ready export, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., No embedded text labels; use icons and clear linework only. Reserve clean margins and text-safe areas for VTT overlays. Render grid and numeric ticks crisply; avoid stylized fonts entirely., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: World Political Boundaries overlay for world map.
textPolicy: labels added as separate overlay, no rasterized tiny text
